This module contains stepper motor controls.

class pilectric.motor_control.stepper.StepperMotorController(step_pin, direction_pin, microstep_pins=(), microsteps=1, pi_connection=None)[source]¶

Bases: pilectric.gpio_controller.GPIOController

Base class for control of stepper motors.

FULL_STEPS_PER_TURN = None¶
MICROSTEPS = {}¶
property clockwise¶

True if motor set to rotate clockwise, False if counterclockwise.

Type

bool

property microsteps¶

The number of microsteps to take.

Type

int

move_at_speed_for_time(speed, seconds)[source]¶

Move the motor a number of degrees in a period of time.

Parameters

  • speed (float) – Speed in degrees/second to move at.

  • time (float) – Time to move the motor for in seconds.

move_by_angle_at_speed(angle, speed)[source]¶

Move the motor a number of degrees at a speed.

Parameters

  • angle (float) – Number of degrees to move.

  • speed (float) – Speed in degrees/second to move at.

move_by_angle_in_time(angle, seconds)[source]¶

Move the motor a number of degrees in a period of time.

Parameters

  • angle (float) – Number of degrees to move.

  • time (float) – Time in which to move the motor by degrees.

step(num_steps, step_delay=0.0005)[source]¶

Step the motor a number of times.

Parameters

num_steps (int) – Number of steps to perform.

Keyword Arguments

step_delay (float) – The time for which the pulse is high. Therefore one step will take 2 * step_delay seconds.

Bases: pilectric.motor_control.stepper.StepperMotorController
